body:
Perverts: So we were thinking that you might wanna?

Misty: Yeah.

Me: Misty run.

Misty: Why?

Perverts: You're coming with us!

Me: *punches him in the face* MISTY RUN!

Misty: *starts running away*

Perverts: No!

Me: Do you what I really hate?

Perverts: When someone takes away a beautiful girl from you?

Me: When people like you three try to take advantage of MY FRIENDS! *beats them all up*

Perverts: *painful groans*
vey cute, i hope more of this artist work get english version
When you walk through a forest trying to catch Pokemon but end up losing more than your poke balls
Must be the mountain air. It always makes stuff bigger.
That is the most unrealistic-looking 10 year old (too young lol). I don't remember Misty looking like this lmao.
